title: EvidenceVariable Handling Extension Value Set

extension.valueMarkdown: EvidenceVariable Handling Extension Value Set [Database Entry: FHIR ValueSet Resource]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper, MD, MSPH [Authors/Creators]. In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform, FOI 383075. Revised 2025-07-08. Available at: https://fevir.net/resources/ValueSet/383075. Computable resource at: https://fevir.net/resources/ValueSet/383075#json.

description: his value set is a temporary workspace while drafting the Evidence Based Medicine Implementation Guide. It may not be stable and may not be persistent. This value set may ultimately move to the FHIR Extensions Pack.
